Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: Graduate Electrical Engineering Curriculum - University of Michigan

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value:
The EECS Department currently offers MS, MSE, and Ph.D. degrees in the following three programs (through the Rackham Graduate School):
(1) Computer Science & Engineering (Hardware, Intelligent Systems, Software, Theory, VLSI).
(2) Electrical Engineering (Applied Electromagnetics and RF Circuits, Circuits & Microsystems, Optics and Photonics, Solid State, VLSI).
(3) Electrical Engineering: Systems (Control, Communications, Signal Processing). The EE pgram has the following possible areas of concentration: (1) Circuits and Microsystems, (2) Applied Electromagnetics and RF Circuits, (3)Optics and Photonics, Optics and Photonics and VLSI."
